ygData.subject: Re: Gate to North?
ygData.msgSnippet: North, in this case, is North Karana.  These first set of teleport spells go to the locations where the set of 4 monoliths are found.  These being in North
ygData.messageBody:
North, in this case, is North Karana. These first set of teleport spells go
to the locations where the set of 4 monoliths are found. These being in
North Karana (next the the bridge to South Karana), Greater Faydark (near
the zone to Lesser Faydark), and Tox Forest (on the Erudin continent).

-Shadowwalker of Karana


> On Eqlizer's site I noticed we get gate to North. I am wondering where is
"North". I assume it is North Qeynos, but I would appreciate if someone can
confirm this for me.
>
> Thanks,
>
> Gantorek <Clan Cathar> of the Povar Server
